Articles.Content: Prepare to meet the SS-16...

Okay, I'm having EXTREME problems with the rocket (worsened by the FAR add-on I have installed).

I will soon post the craft file with the custom fairings, but I have a challenge to all of you reading this:

1. Make a truck that can move this beast around.

2. make a TEL system with a very good amount of stability.

3. Launch it with FAR and get a flawless flight.

4. Post the craft file.

Rules:

1. Rockets must stay as solid fueled rockets for realism.

2. Rocket launch time must be no greater from TEL movement to launch than 20 seconds (less would be preferable).

3. FAR must be used.

4. Rocket must have minimal modifications.

Now, let the games BEGIN! YEAH!
back in 0.18 days...
